paragraph.paragraph: [1] Bertrand Meyer: http://www.eiffel.com/doc/#etlEiffel: The Language, Prentice Hall, 1992. (Available from ISE.) [2] Bertrand Meyer: http://www.eiffel.com/doc/#ruReusable Software: The Base Object-Oriented Component Libraries, Prentice Hall, 1994. (Available from ISE and included in the standard delivery of ISE Eiffel.) [3] W. Richard Stevens: Unix Network Programming, Prentice Hall, 1990.
